M-Taxi

 Developer:	 Mg Chit Nann Ko 						 Mg Nay Ye Lin
								 Mg Myat Noe Aung 
App-Objective:

 Our application is aim as written to travellers and visitor to convenience and easy.As traveller, their safe as possible because their route was saved to the server of M-Taxi.So, as server,can sue to the driver when the customer meet the drangers during rides his car.And the customer knows the distance and duration of the trop.
